College of  Applied Health  Sciences                 Physical Therapy Faculty Practice      View Menu              Offering expert consultations, evaluations and interventions     At UIC’s Physical Therapy Faculty Practice, we’re committed to providing a truly exceptional experience for all patients who entrust us with their care.  We know that all of our patients are unique, so we tailor our services to your individual goals. Our team is made up of multi-specialty, highly-skilled Physical Therapists, Clinical Exercise Physiologists and Dietitians who work to create an individualized treatment plan just for you.  We’re embedded in the Chicago community, providing high-quality physical therapy, dietary and cardiac services in a convenient location, and we make coming to see us as easy as possible. We look forward to working with you to improve your health!            They really care about helping you get back into shape and in control of your life   A PT Faculty Practice client        What we can do for you     If aches and pains are preventing you from doing what’s important to you, we’re here to address the problem and make sure you know how to avoid it in the future. If you want to get back to your team—on the field, in the office, or at home—we’ll help you reach your goal.             Physical Therapy   Restore and maintain optimal physical function            Cardiac Rehabilitation   Improve your physical fitness and health through exercise training and lifestyle change            Cardiopulmonary Exercise Stress Testing   Measure how well your body responds to exercise and assess your fitness               The staff was great and my therapist provided excellent care. I can't say enough good things about the services I received!   A PT Faculty Practice client        Research and education   As part of UIC’s College of Applied Health Sciences, we partner with other innovative research centers and renowned leaders in the field. This helps us bring you services that are based on the very latest in research and best practices.  We are also active in training the next generation of physical therapists, working with the UIC Department of Physical Therapy to provide a residency program in orthopedic physical therapy .
